name: Senior auditor
description:
Zeppelin International is looking for a

Senior auditor

You will be supporting the Internal Audit team on their journey of transformation into the future by using digital technology enabling auditing at the speed of risk.

Main Responsibilities:

The key responsibilities you are expected to provide Advocate governance, risk management, and internal controls in the organization as well as communicate and influence management at all levels across the company. In addition to this, you will be expected to work on different types audits (IT, finance, compliance, etc), special assignments and internal consulting projects on request of the Board. You will be expected to understand the strategy, organizational value, business, and risks driving the audit scope of the company and be involved in the risk assessment process and management of different internal projects

Requirements:

  • University degree is required; Areas of study could include (but are not limited to) Business, Finance, Mathematics, Organizational Behaviour, Computer Science, and Engineering ACCA or analogue is required.
  • Working experience from 5 years of prior hands-on experience as Finance Controller/Financial Analyst of an international company/7 years in internal and external audits, not less then 3 in a managerial position.
  • English Language - Advanced level (both written and oral), German is an advantage.
  • Advanced user of MS Office applications (Excel, Word, PPT), experienced in 1S (ERP/ 8, EDMS), MS Dynamics, Teams, Power BI, data analysis and visualization tools, knowledge of SAP ERP and BW will be advantage.
  • Strong relationship builder and interaction with internal clients.
  • Successful in leading audit engagements and building high performance teams.
  • Commitment and ambition to become one of the best in the field of risk management and internal audit.
  • Deep understanding of internal control concepts and models.
  • Curiosity and willingness to learn new topics and acquire knowledge of the Group's business over time.
  • Relationship Builder and good people skills.
  • Self-motivation to complete tasks without much supervision.
  • Mind-set of providing value added services.
  • Creative to generate new projects and ideas to improve both operations and the Group's audit function.

We offer:

  • office in the North-West of Moscow (69 km MKAD, TVK Greenwood, Skhodnenskaya metro station).
  • Competitive package, medical insurance.
  • Job Schedule 9-18, negotiable + overtimes.
  • Business Trips - 0-25%, international travels.
